summary: A tall and powerful companion, intended for low level characters.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, so don't go expecting anything fancy.

This mod adds a Nord Warrior to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun who you can recruit as a follower, his name is Throgarn Strong-Arm. He will blindly accompany you for no reason upon asking him to, because again, this ain't anything fancy. If you are seeking a lore-friendly, capable and well equipped companion then look no further! Throgarn comes equipped with a full set of steel armour, steel sword and steel shield. He is only level 15, so he is suited towards low level character and new play-throughs! Also, he is pretty tall.

Also, that quest I mentioned 2 years ago, yeah the one that I said would be coming "soon". Yeah, I haven't gotten around to finishing that yet... sooo, expect it to be out sometime "soon", again.  

Installation:

- To install this mod simply place the downloaded .esp file into your skyrim data folder, which will more than likely be this; 
( C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data ).

- Once you have placed the file in your data folder, all you have to do is activate it with your preferred mod handling utility or the Skyrim Launcher.

Un-installation:

simply deactivate the mod and remove it from your data folder.

Enjoy the mod!
author: PottyDuck
